server {
	listen 80 default_server;
	listen [::]:80 default_server;
	server_name 54.227.128.161;
	add_header X-Served-By ${hostname};
	# SSL configuration
	#
	# listen 443 ssl default_server;
	# listen [::]:443 ssl default_server;
	#
	# Note: You should disable gzip for SSL traffic.
	# See: https://bugs.debian.org/773332
	#
	# Read up on ssl_ciphers to ensure a secure configuration.
	# See: https://bugs.debian.org/765782
	#
	# Self signed certs generated by the ssl-cert package
	# Don't use them in a production server!
	

	
	location / {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001;
	}	
	# nginx Serves contacts
	location /contacts {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001/contacts;
	}
	# nginx Serves login
	location /login {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001/login;
	}
	# nginx Serves register
	location /register {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001/register;
	}
	# nginx Serves profile
	location /profile {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001/profile;
	}
		# nginx Serves dashboard
	location /dashboard {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001/dashboard;
	}
	 # nginx serves API
	location /api {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5002/api;
	}
	location /static {
        proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5001;
	}
	# 404 error page
	error_page 404 /404.html;
	location /404 {
        root /var/www/html;
        internal;
	}
	# include snippets/snakeoil.conf;

	root /free_addiserp;

	# Add index.php to the list if you are using PHP
	index index.html index.htm index.nginx-debian.html;

	#server_name _;

}
